the github issue number.

## Verification

List the steps needed to make sure this thing works

- [ ] Start `msfconsole`
- [ ] `use exploit/windows/smb/ms08_067_netapi`
- [ ] ...
- [ ] **Verify** the thing does what it should
- [ ] **Verify** the thing does not do what it should not
